changelog.title: Shield House: Attack Vector Challenge
changelog.description: Timed True/False game covering 16 attack types with circular board, scoring, and high score tracking.

changelog.title: Web House: Subnet Calculator
changelog.description: IPv4 subnet calculator with network/broadcast addresses, host ranges, CIDR notation, and class detection.

changelog.title: Forge House: Windows Shortcuts Reference
changelog.description: Searchable quick reference for 24 essential Windows keyboard shortcuts organized by category.
